items.title: Ringke’s new iPhone 17 case collection includes MagSafe clear, rugged Onyx, Folio Grip wallet, more from $16
items.summary:
Apple’s iPhone 17 launch has sparked a flurry of new cases, some of which are even discounted right now. Ringke’s extensive lineup of iPhone 17 cases are also live now via its official storefront on Amazon, where you’ll also find the brand offering screen and camera lens protectors. These are also some of the most affordable options out there for the new iPhone, with prices starting at just $15.99 Prime shipped. From simple clear, and silicone cases to more rugged options, there’s a good mix of options to choose from Ringke, and you can check them out below.

items.title: Bluesky will comply with age verification laws in South Dakota and Wyoming after exiting Mississippi
items.summary: Bluesky says the age verification laws strike "the right balance," so it won't have to exit the states as it did in Mississippi.

items.title: A bombshell child safety leak changed Meta — it got worse

items.title: Anonymity is dead and we’re all content now
items.summary: One night, a friend of mine went out for dinner with her husband and toddler. The toddler, who sometimes had trouble swallowing, choked on his food - and threw up, repeatedly, in the restaurant. People around them were laughing while my friend and her family were in distress, adding to their embarrassment. But that wasn't […]

items.title: CASETiFY’s new iPhone 17 Glaze case safeguards the wild prints under a protective layer
items.summary:
CASETiFY is one of the more well-known iPhone case brands out there, and it has now unleashed upgraded versions of its staple Impact case alongside a giant selection of wild patterns and prints for iPhone 17. This year, however, it is introducing a new case known as the Glaze that, like the iPhone display, itself, protects all of those fun patterns and images underneath of protective coating.

But there was only one thing that seemingly caused deep feelings in everyone, both live in Cupertino and online: the orange iPhone. THE ORANGE IPHONE. On this episode of […]

items.title: Polish couple's house hit by drone as they watched TV news
items.summary: WYRYKI-WOLA, Poland (Reuters) -Pensioner Tomasz Wesolowski had a lucky escape on Wednesday when a drone crashed into his house as he was watching news on television about Russian drones flying into Polish airspace. Read full story

items.title: Anker’s SOLIX Fan Fest Sale increases savings on power stations as high as 63% with deals starting from $120
items.summary:
Anker has launched its SOLIX Fan Fest Sale running through September 21, with up to 63% discounts on its massive power station and accessory lineup – which is an increase from the brand’s Labor Day event. Alongside the low prices we spotted on the EverFrost 2 electric coolers, as well as the launch deals on the new C1000 Gen 2 station, we also noticed the brand’s other recent release, the SOLIX F3000 Portable Power Station dropping to $1,649 shipped during this sale, which sits $1 under Amazon’s pricing. It fetches $2,599 at full price, with discounts having mostly gone as low as $1,699, unless the sales offered bonus savings that saw the cost drop to $1,614 or the one-time $1,599 rate we saw during Prime Day. The deal here is the third-best we have tracked, saving you $950 off the going rate and bringing you one of the latest, upgraded backup power solutions from the Anker flag.

items.title: NASA rover finds potential sign of ancient life in Martian rocks
items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -A sample obtained by NASA's Perseverance rover of rock formed billions of years ago from sediment on the bottom of a lake contains potential signs of ancient microbial life on Mars, according to scientists, though the minerals spotted in the sample also can form through nonbiological processes. Read full story

items.title: Africa feeding 20 million more children with school meals, WFP says
items.summary: JOHANNESBURG (Reuters) -Governments in sub-Saharan Africa have provided school meals to roughly 20 million extra children over the past two years, the World Food Programme (WFP) said on Wednesday, showing a move away from dependence on foreign aid and a stronger commitment to education. items.title: Canada says Russian drone incursion was reckless, escalatory

items.title: Tenways End of Season Sale drops 37-pound CGO600 Pro e-bikes to $1,599 with $217 in FREE gear ($2,116 value), more
items.summary:
Tenways is continuing most of its Labor Day savings within its newly launched End of Season Sale, which is taking up to $500 off select e-bikes, while also offering an additional $200 discount when buying two. Among the lineup, Tenways’ popular CGO600 Pro Lightweight Commuter e-bikes (both the chain-drive and belt-drive variants) are dropping back down to $1,599 shipped, while also coming with $118 in free gear and a complimentary gift box (a $99 value). Coming down off its $1,899 full tag price, things have been taken lower in the past, though since March we’ve been seeing tariff hikes keep the price up at $1,599, with occasional falls lower to $1,499. You’re still getting a solid $517 savings package with this deal, not to mention the additional savings you can get buying two together and/or verifying your status as a medical provider, first responder, teacher, or military member (giving you an extra $150 off).

more…

items.summary:
Samsung 128GB PRO Plus microSD card + Reader combo

Buy for $15 (Reg. $25)

What we love

This tried-and-tested Samsung PRO Plus microSD card + USB reader combo is now down to one of the lowest prices we have tracked for it. It’s rated U3 and Class 10 for high-speed read/write performance with speeds hitting 180MB/s, and it’s also built to withstand water, X-rays, extreme temperatures, magnets, and other everyday hazards. We reviewed the 256GB variant of this card when it came out, and you can get more details here.

items.title: Greenworks’ framed 1,900 PSI electric pressure washer back at $120 while the 12-inch cleaner attachment is at $23 (Today only)
items.summary:
As part of its Deals of the Day, Best Buy is offering the Greenworks 1,900 PSI Electric Framed Pressure Washer at $119.99 shipped (currently unavailable on Amazon and beating the brand’s direct website by $30), which is running parallel to the one-day-only discount we’re also seeing on the brand’s 12-inch Surface Cleaner Attachment at $22.99 shipped. That pressure washer would normally run you $200 at full price, with discounts mostly taking it to this rate or higher, more often as a one-day-only deal, which has only been beaten out by a one-time discount to $118. For the rest of the day, you can pick one up at $80 off to tackle your outdoor cleaning needs at the next-best price we have tracked – landing just $2 above the all-time low.

You can also score the 512GB version of TEAMGROUP’s latest Apex Express microSD for $107.99 shipped. Head below for more details.

items.title: Sony launches giant fall PlayStation sale with over 3,400 titles at up to 75% off
items.summary:
While Nintendo did just officially confirm its long-rumored and highly-anticipated September Direct showcase for this week, today we are taking a look at the PlayStation side of things. Sony has now unleashed the latest major event on the PlayStation Store with the new Autumn Adventures sale featuring deals on over 3,400 titles and DLC expansions at up to 75% off. From MLB The Show 25 and Split Fiction to College Football 26, Call of Duty titles, and the ongoing price drop on Assassin’s Creed Shadows at 33% off, now’s a great time to shore up your catalog ahead of the big holiday releases – the sale will run from today through September 24.

items.title: Land a FREE $20 credit w/ AirPods Pro 3 pre-orders + up to $45 off with trade
items.summary:
Much like we featured this morning on the new Apple Watch Series 11, pre-orders are now live on the new AirPods Pro 3. If you have some free store credit at Amazon, you might want to grab them there, and Best Buy has some deals to consider as well. As of right now, it does not look like Apple is accepting trades towards its new pro-grade AirPods, but Best Buy is delivering a FREE $20 store credit for members on top of some trade-in value for your previous set. 

more…

items.title: Cherry’s regularly $179 wireless mechanical gaming keyboard with RGB just plunged to $50 (72% off)
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Cherry’s official storefront offering its MX 8.2 TKL Wireless Mechanical Gaming Keyboard in black for $49.99 shipped. This particular model with the brand’s MX2A switches debuted around the same time last year, and has mostly been fetching its full $179 price. Today’s deal, however, delivers a whopping 72% discount on it, shaving $129 off its usual going rate. It dropped to the $100 mark a couple of times this year, but today’s deal steps things up with an additional $50 off, marking a new best price to beat. The white variant of this keyboard is also seeing a discount, albeit a relatively lighter one at $69.99 shipped. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Tinder evolves some features into dating ‘modes’
items.summary: The app is getting two new modes, Double Date and College Mode — essentially extensions of existing features — alongside a "For You" mode on the home screen that presents the classic Tinder experience. The company said it will add more dating modes that will lean into interests, dating intentions, and different ways to connect.

items.title: How to score AirPods Pro 2 at $150 less than the new series 3 model
items.summary:
Apple’s new AirPods Pro 3 have arrived and are now up for pre-order with a series of new features, better ANC, heart-rate monitoring, and more. But the AirPods Pro 2 were the world’s most popular wireless buds for a reason and if you’re not looking to drop the full $249 on the new series 3 set, Woot is offering a notable factory refurbished deal on AirPods Pro 2 down at $99.99 Prime shipped using code EARBUDS20 at checkout with a full Amazon warranty. 

more…

items.title: Up to 50% off launch deals on ESR’s iPhone 17 cases now live: MagSafe-compatible models with Camera Control from just $10
items.summary:
Apple’s iPhone 17 lineup is now official, and it arrives with a wave of new cases and accessories. We’ve already looked at options from brands like Spigen and Nomad, and now ESR is joining the mix with its iPhone 17 case collection – currently available with launch discounts of up to 50% off. ESR has new cases for the entire iPhone 17 lineup, including the standard iPhone 17, Air, and the Pro models, and they’re starting at just $9.99 Prime shipped right now. All these models are MagSafe-compatible and have a dedicated Camera Control button, and they’re all available in a bunch of different finishes. Head below for a closer look and more details.
